ForWhom.title: For whom?
ForWhom.description: The event is dedicated to all AI enthusiasts, developers, scientists, students, and young entrepreneurs who want to bring their products to market and develop innovative technologies. Regardless of your skill level, there's something for everyone!
ForWhom.joinMessage: Join us and discover the future of technology!
